mapper.insert: INSERT INTO staffNotice(NOTICECODE, SUBJECT, CONTENT, USERSCODE, ISNOTICE) VALUES (notice_seq.NEXTVAL, #{subject}, #{content}, #{usersCode}, #{isNotice})
mapper.select: SELECT S.USERSCODE, N.NOTICECODE, SUBJECT, CONTENT, TO_CHAR(CREATED, 'YYYY-MM-DD') CREATED, S.NAME, ISNOTICE FROM STAFF S JOIN staffNotice N ON S.USERSCODE=N.USERSCODE WHERE NOTICECODE = #{num}

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICECODE, SUBJECT FROM staffNotice
AND (NOTICECODE > #{num})
ORDER BY NOTICECODE ASC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1

SELECT tb.* FROM ( SELECT NOTICECODE, SUBJECT FROM staffNotice
AND (NOTICECODE < #{num})
ORDER BY NOTICECODE DESC ) tb WHERE ROWNUM=1
mapper.update: UPDATE staffNotice SET subject=#{subject}, content=#{content}, isNotice = #{isNotice} WHERE noticeCode = #{noticeCode}
